languages.text: "Вольный Торговец, я уважаю вас и бремя вашей миссии служения Империуму. Но я — одна из Адепта Сороритас, и главный мой долг — перед Императором и Экклезиархией. Проигнорировать просьбу святого отца, не отправиться искать культистов, — грех и небрежение! Поэтому и только поэтому я покинула вас и направилась сюда сама".

traits.locale_text: "Вольный Торговец, я уважаю вас и бремя вашей миссии служения Империуму. Но я — одна из Адепта Сороритас, и главный мой долг — перед Императором и Экклезиархией. Проигнорировать просьбу святого отца, не отправиться искать культистов, — грех и небрежение! Поэтому и только поэтому я покинула вас и направилась сюда сама".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Rogue Trader, I respect you and the burden of your mission to serve the Imperium. But I am one of the Adepta Sororitas, and my primary duty is to the Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy. To ignore a priest's request and refuse to search for cultists would be a dereliction of that duty and a transgression! That is the one and only reason why I left your side and came here myself."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец, я уважаю вас и бремя вашей миссии служения Империуму. Но я — одна из Адепта Сороритас, и главный мой долг — перед Императором и Экклезиархией. Проигнорировать просьбу святого отца, не отправиться искать культистов, — грех и небрежение! Поэтому и только поэтому я покинула вас и направилась сюда сама".

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, I respect you and the burden of your mission of serving the Imperium. But I am one of the Adepta Sororitas, and my primary duty is to the Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy To ignore a priest's request and refuse to search for cultists would be a sin and negligence! That is the one and only reason why I left your side and came here myself."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, I respect you and the burden of your mission of serving the Imperium. But I am one of the Adepta Sororitas, and my primary duty is to the Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy To ignore a priest's request and refuse to search for cultists would be a sin and negligence! That is the one and only reason why I left your side and came here myself."

But I am one of the Adepta Sororitas, and my primary duty is to the Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy. To ignore a priest's request and refuse to search for cultists would be a dereliction of that duty and a sin! That is the one and only reason why I left your side and came here myself."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, I respect you and the burden of your mission to serve the Imperium. But I am one of the Adepta Sororitas, and my primary duty is to the Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy. To ignore a priest's request and refuse to search for cultists would be a dereliction of that duty and a sin! That is the one and only reason why I left your side and came here myself."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, I respect you and the burden of your mission to serve the Imperium. But I am one of the Adepta Sororitas, and my primary duty is to the Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy. To ignore a priest's request and refuse to search for cultists would be a dereliction of that duty and a transgression! That is the one and only reason why I left your side and came here myself."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “行商浪人，我尊重你为效忠帝国的使命感，但我是修女会的成员，我的主要职责是为帝皇与国教服务。如果我无视那位牧师的请求，拒绝搜查邪教分子，那就相当于失职，是一种罪过！我之所以会离开你身边，孤身来到这个地方，完全是出于这个原因。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I respect you and the burden of your mission to serve the Imperium. But I am one of the Adepta Sororitas, and my primary duty is to the Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy. To ignore a priest's request and refuse to search for cultists would be a dereliction of that duty and a transgression! That is the one and only reason why I left your side and came here myself."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人，我尊重你为效忠帝国的使命感，但我是修女会的成员，我的主要职责是为帝皇与国教服务。如果我无视那位牧师的请求，拒绝搜查邪教分子，那就相当于失职，是一种罪过！我之所以会离开你身边，孤身来到这个地方，完全是出于这个原因。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente, le respeto y respeto el peso de su misión al servicio del Imperium. Pero formo parte del Adepta Sororitas y mi deber principal es hacia el Emperador y la Eclesiarquía. ¡Ignorar la solicitud de un sacerdote y negarme a buscar sectarios sería un incumplimiento de ese deber y una transgresión monumental! Es la única razón por la que abandoné su lado para acudir personalmente».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I respect you and the burden of your mission to serve the Imperium. But I am one of the Adepta Sororitas, and my primary duty is to the Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy. To ignore a priest's request and refuse to search for cultists would be a dereliction of that duty and a transgression! That is the one and only reason why I left your side and came here myself."

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente, le respeto y respeto el peso de su misión al servicio del Imperium. Pero formo parte del Adepta Sororitas y mi deber principal es hacia el Emperador y la Eclesiarquía. ¡Ignorar la solicitud de un sacerdote y negarme a buscar sectarios sería un incumplimiento de ese deber y un pecado! Es la única razón por la que abandoné su lado para acudir personalmente».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者、我は御身を尊敬します。帝国に奉仕する陛下の使命は重いものです。しかし、我は修道聖女会の一員であり、我の第一の義務は皇帝と帝国聖教会にある。司祭の要請を無視し、教団信者の捜索を拒否することは、その義務を放棄することであり、背信行為なのだ！それが、我が御身の側を離れ、自らここに来た唯一無二の理由です」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I respect you and the burden of your mission to serve the Imperium. But I am one of the Adepta Sororitas, and my primary duty is to the Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy. To ignore a priest's request and refuse to search for cultists would be a dereliction of that duty and a transgression! That is the one and only reason why I left your side and came here myself."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者、我は御身を尊敬します。帝国に奉仕する陛下の使命は重いものです。しかし、我は修道聖女会の一員であり、我の第一の義務は皇帝と帝国聖教会にある。司祭の要請を無視し、教団信者の捜索を拒否することは、その義務を放棄することであり、背信行為なのだ！それが、我が御身の側を離れ、自らここに来た唯一無二の理由です」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, ich respektiere Euch und die Bürde Eurer Mission, dem Imperium zu dienen. Aber ich gehöre zur Adepta Sororitas und unterstehe primär dem Imperator und der Ekklesiarchie. Die Bitte eines Priesters zu ignorieren und eine Suche nach Kultisten zu verweigern, wäre eine Vernachlässigung meiner Pflichten und zudem ein Vergehen! Das ist der einzige Grund, warum ich Eure Seite verlassen habe und auf eigene Faust hergekommen bin."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I respect you and the burden of your mission to serve the Imperium. But I am one of the Adepta Sororitas, and my primary duty is to the Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy. To ignore a priest's request and refuse to search for cultists would be a dereliction of that duty and a transgression! That is the one and only reason why I left your side and came here myself."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, ich respektiere Euch und die Bürde Eurer Mission, dem Imperium zu dienen. Aber ich gehöre zur Adepta Sororitas und unterstehe primär dem Imperator und der Ekklesiarchie. Die Bitte eines Priesters zu ignorieren und eine Suche nach Kultisten zu verweigern, wäre eine Vernachlässigung meiner Pflichten und zudem eine Sünde! Das ist der einzige Grund, warum ich Eure Seite verlassen habe und auf eigene Faust hergekommen bin."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Laissez-moi vous rappeler que je fais partie de l'Adepta Sororitas, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Malgré tout le respect que j'ai pour vous et le fardeau de votre mission au service de l'Imperium, mon devoir envers l'Empereur et l'Ecclésiarchie passe avant tout. Si j'avais refusé de chercher ces cultistes à la demande d'un prêtre, j'aurais manqué à ce devoir et commis une transgression ! C'est la seule et unique raison pour laquelle je suis venue ici sans vous. »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I respect you and the burden of your mission to serve the Imperium. But I am one of the Adepta Sororitas, and my primary duty is to the Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy. To ignore a priest's request and refuse to search for cultists would be a dereliction of that duty and a transgression! That is the one and only reason why I left your side and came here myself."

traits.locale_text: « Laissez-moi vous rappeler que je fais partie de l'Adepta Sororitas, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Malgré tout le respect que j'ai pour vous et le fardeau de votre mission au service de l'Imperium, mon devoir envers l'Empereur et l'Ecclésiarchie passe avant tout. Si j'avais refusé de chercher ces cultistes à la demande d'un prêtre, j'aurais manqué à ce devoir et commis un péché ! C'est la seule et unique raison pour laquelle je suis venue ici sans vous. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, sana da İmparatorluk'a hizmet etme görevinin ağırlığına da saygı duyuyorum. Ancak ben bir Adepta Sororitas'ım. Benim sadakatim, her şeyden önce İmparator'un kendisine ve Ekleşiarşi'yedir. Rahibin, tarikatçıları araştırma talebini kulak ardı etmek, göreve sırtını dönmektir ve büyük günahtır! Yanından ayrılıp buraya tek başına gelmemin tek sebebi buydu."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I respect you and the burden of your mission to serve the Imperium. But I am one of the Adepta Sororitas, and my primary duty is to the Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy. To ignore a priest's request and refuse to search for cultists would be a dereliction of that duty and a transgression! That is the one and only reason why I left your side and came here myself."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, sana da İmparatorluk'a hizmet etme görevinin ağırlığına da saygı duyuyorum. Ancak ben bir Adepta Sororitas'ım. Benim sadakatim, her şeyden önce İmparator'un kendisine ve Ekleşiarşi'yedir. Rahibin, tarikatçıları araştırma talebini kulak ardı etmek, göreve sırtını dönmektir ve en büyük günahtır! Yanından ayrılıp buraya tek başına gelmemin tek sebebi buydu."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
